NAME: T_e
DESCRIPTION: Electron temperature across the radius; key driver of fusion reactivity and confinement (keV).

NAME: T_i
DESCRIPTION: Ion temperature across the plasma radius; tells how hot the ions are from center to edge (keV).

NAME: n_e
DESCRIPTION: Electron density profile; number of electrons per cubic meter across the plasma radius (m^-3).

NAME: n_i
DESCRIPTION: Ion density profile; determines pressure and fusion fuel content (m^-3).

NAME: n_impurity
DESCRIPTION: Impurity ion density; affects radiation losses and plasma dilution (m^-3).

NAME: Z_eff
DESCRIPTION: Effective ion charge.

NAME: Z_i
DESCRIPTION: Main ion charge.

NAME: Z_impurity
DESCRIPTION: Impurity ion charge.

NAME: psi
DESCRIPTION: Poloidal magnetic flux; defines magnetic surfaces and confinement structure.

NAME: psi_norm
DESCRIPTION: Normalized poloidal magnetic flux (0=core, 1=edge).

NAME: spr
DESCRIPTION: Derivative of poloidal flux.

NAME: Phi
DESCRIPTION: Toroidal magnetic flux; relates to toroidal field strength.

NAME: vpr
DESCRIPTION: Derivative of toroidal flux.

NAME: R_in
DESCRIPTION: Inner major radius of each flux surface.

NAME: R_out
DESCRIPTION: Outer major radius of each flux surface.

NAME: area
DESCRIPTION: Cross‑sectional area of each flux surface.

NAME: delta
DESCRIPTION: Plasma triangularity; describes shaping of outer contour.

NAME: delta_lower
DESCRIPTION: Lower triangularity; shape near the bottom of plasma.

NAME: delta_upper
DESCRIPTION: Upper triangularity; shape near the top of plasma.

NAME: elongation
DESCRIPTION: Vertical stretching of plasma cross‑section; increases performance.

NAME: g0
DESCRIPTION: Metric coefficient from equilibrium model (geometry factor).

NAME: g1
DESCRIPTION: Metric coefficient from equilibrium model.

NAME: g2
DESCRIPTION: Metric coefficient affecting curvature and stability.

NAME: g3
DESCRIPTION: Metric coefficient affecting magnetic shear and shaping.

NAME: magnetic_shear
DESCRIPTION: Rate of change of q with radius; influences turbulence and stability.

NAME: q
DESCRIPTION: Safety factor; number of toroidal turns per poloidal turn for field lines—key for MHD stability.

NAME: r_mid
DESCRIPTION: Midplane minor radius of each flux surface.

NAME: volume
DESCRIPTION: Volume enclosed by each flux surface.

NAME: Ip_profile
DESCRIPTION: Cumulative plasma current versus radius.

NAME: Ip_profile_from_geo
DESCRIPTION: Plasma current reconstructed from geometry.

NAME: j_bootstrap
DESCRIPTION: Self‑generated current from pressure gradients (bootstrap current).

NAME: j_ecrh
DESCRIPTION: Current driven by electron cyclotron heating.

NAME: j_external
DESCRIPTION: Other externally driven current (typically zero).

NAME: j_ohmic
DESCRIPTION: Ohmically‑driven current density from transformer action.

NAME: j_total
DESCRIPTION: Total current density; main driver of magnetic structure.

NAME: psi_from_Ip
DESCRIPTION: Flux reconstructed from current profile.

NAME: psi_from_geo
DESCRIPTION: Flux reconstructed from geometric model.

NAME: D_turb_e
DESCRIPTION: Electron particle diffusivity due to turbulence.

NAME: V_turb_e
DESCRIPTION: Electron convective velocity due to turbulence.

NAME: chi_turb_e
DESCRIPTION: Electron heat diffusivity from turbulence.

NAME: chi_turb_i
DESCRIPTION: Ion heat diffusivity from turbulence; describes heat spreading.

NAME: ei_exchange
DESCRIPTION: Energy exchange between electrons and ions.

NAME: sigma_parallel
DESCRIPTION: Parallel electrical conductivity.

NAME: p_alpha_e
DESCRIPTION: Heating power density from alpha particles to electrons.

NAME: p_alpha_i
DESCRIPTION: Heating power density from fusion alpha particles to ions.

NAME: p_cyclotron_radiation_e
DESCRIPTION: Cyclotron radiation power loss from electrons.

NAME: p_ecrh_e
DESCRIPTION: Power deposition from electron cyclotron heating.

NAME: p_generic_heat_e
DESCRIPTION: Generic heating added to electrons.

NAME: p_generic_heat_i
DESCRIPTION: Generic heating added to ions (usually unused).

NAME: p_impurity_radiation_e
DESCRIPTION: Radiative power loss from impurities.

NAME: p_ohmic_e
DESCRIPTION: Ohmic heating power delivered to electrons.

NAME: F
DESCRIPTION: Toroidal field function

NAME: FFprime
DESCRIPTION: Derivative of the squared toroidal field function; part of Grad-Shafranov equilibrium equation.

NAME: pprime
DESCRIPTION: Radial derivative of pressure relative to flux; important for equilibrium.

NAME: pressure_thermal_e
DESCRIPTION: Thermal pressure from electrons.

NAME: pressure_thermal_i
DESCRIPTION: Thermal pressure from ions.

NAME: pressure_thermal_total
DESCRIPTION: Total plasma thermal pressure.

NAME: g0_over_vpr
DESCRIPTION: Metric tensor element.

NAME: g1_over_vpr
DESCRIPTION: Metric tensor element.

NAME: g1_over_vpr2
DESCRIPTION: Metric tensor element.

NAME: g2g3_over_rhon
DESCRIPTION: Metric tensor element.

NAME: j_generic_current
DESCRIPTION: Placeholder for other current drive sources.

NAME: v_loop
DESCRIPTION: v_loop radial profile

NAME: H20
DESCRIPTION: H20 scalar measurement

NAME: H89P
DESCRIPTION: H89P scalar measurement

NAME: H97L
DESCRIPTION: H97L scalar measurement

NAME: H98
DESCRIPTION: Performance factor vs ITER H‑mode scaling; >1 means better than expected.

NAME: Q_fusion
DESCRIPTION: Fusion gain: fusion power divided by external heating.

NAME: beta_N
DESCRIPTION: Normalized beta; key metric for high‑performance operation.

NAME: beta_pol
DESCRIPTION: Poloidal beta; relates to shaping and stability.

NAME: beta_tor
DESCRIPTION: Toroidal beta; fraction of pressure relative to magnetic pressure.

NAME: dW_thermal_dt
DESCRIPTION: Change in stored energy

NAME: tau_E
DESCRIPTION: Energy confinement time; how long heat stays in plasma.

NAME: E_aux
DESCRIPTION: Total auxiliary heating energy delivered so far.

NAME: E_fusion
DESCRIPTION: Total fusion energy generated so far.

NAME: P_alpha_e
DESCRIPTION: Alpha heating power deposited into electrons.

NAME: P_alpha_i
DESCRIPTION: Alpha heating power deposited into ions.

NAME: P_alpha_total
DESCRIPTION: Total alpha heating power (main internal heating source in a burning plasma).

NAME: P_aux_e
DESCRIPTION: Total auxiliary heating delivered to electrons.

NAME: P_aux_i
DESCRIPTION: Total auxiliary heating delivered to ions.

NAME: P_aux_total
DESCRIPTION: Total auxiliary heating power.

NAME: P_bremsstrahlung_e
DESCRIPTION: Total bremsstrahlung radiation power loss from electrons.

NAME: P_cyclotron_e
DESCRIPTION: Cyclotron radiation losses from electrons.

NAME: P_ei_exchange_e
DESCRIPTION: Energy transfered to electrons from ions.

NAME: P_ei_exchange_i
DESCRIPTION: Energy transfered to ions from electrons.

NAME: P_external_injected
DESCRIPTION: Total externally injected heating power from all sources.

NAME: P_ohmic_e
DESCRIPTION: Ohmic heating.

NAME: P_SOL_e
DESCRIPTION: P_SOL_e scalar measurement

NAME: P_SOL_i
DESCRIPTION: P_SOL_i scalar measurement

NAME: P_SOL_total
DESCRIPTION: Total power flowing to the scrape‑off layer.

NAME: B_0
DESCRIPTION: Toroidal magnetic field at magnetic axis.

NAME: R_major
DESCRIPTION: Major radius of plasma center.

NAME: a_minor
DESCRIPTION: Minor radius of plasma cross‑section.

NAME: q95
DESCRIPTION: Safety factor at 95% radius; strong stability indicator.

NAME: q_min
DESCRIPTION: Minimum safety factor; low values risk instabilities.

NAME: rho_q_min
DESCRIPTION: Radial location of minimum q.

NAME: S_gas_puff
DESCRIPTION: Gas puff fueling source.

NAME: S_generic_particle
DESCRIPTION: Pellet injection fueling source.

NAME: S_pellet
DESCRIPTION: Generic particle source.

NAME: S_total
DESCRIPTION: Sum of all fueling sources.

NAME: W_pol
DESCRIPTION: Poloidal magnetic field energy.

NAME: W_thermal_e
DESCRIPTION: Electron stored thermal energy in plasma.

NAME: W_thermal_i
DESCRIPTION: Ion stored thermal energy in plasma.

NAME: W_thermal_total
DESCRIPTION: Total stored thermal energy in plasma.

NAME: fgw_n_e_line_avg
DESCRIPTION: Line-averaged Greenwald fraction.

NAME: fgw_n_e_volume_avg
DESCRIPTION: Volume-averaged Greenwald fraction.

NAME: n_e_line_avg
DESCRIPTION: Line-averaged electron density.

NAME: n_e_volume_avg
DESCRIPTION: Volume-averaged electron density.

NAME: A_i
DESCRIPTION: Mass number of the main ion species.

NAME: A_impurity
DESCRIPTION: Mass number of the main impurity species.

NAME: I_aux_generic
DESCRIPTION: Net external driven current from generic systems.

NAME: I_bootstrap
DESCRIPTION: Total bootstrap current.

NAME: I_ecrh
DESCRIPTION: Current driven by ECRH.

NAME: P_LH
DESCRIPTION: Power threshold estimate for L–H transition.

NAME: P_LH_high_density
DESCRIPTION: Power threshold estimate for L–H transition.

NAME: P_LH_min
DESCRIPTION: Power threshold estimate for L–H transition.

NAME: P_aux_generic_e
DESCRIPTION: Generic deposition of heating power.

NAME: P_aux_generic_i
DESCRIPTION: Generic deposition of heating power.

NAME: P_icrh_e
DESCRIPTION: Electron totals for ICRH heating power.

NAME: P_icrh_i
DESCRIPTION: Ion totals for ICRH heating power.

NAME: P_icrh_total
DESCRIPTION: Total ICRH heating power.

NAME: P_radiation_e
DESCRIPTION: P_radiation_e scalar measurement.

NAME: Phi_b
DESCRIPTION: Boundary toroidal flux.

NAME: Phi_b_dot
DESCRIPTION: Derivative of the boundary toroidal flux.

NAME: T_e_volume_avg
DESCRIPTION: Electron temperature averaged over plasma volume.

NAME: T_i_volume_avg
DESCRIPTION: Ion temperature averaged over volume.

NAME: drho
DESCRIPTION: Spacing between radial grid points (for the profile arrays).

NAME: drho_norm
DESCRIPTION: Normalized radial grid points spacing.

NAME: li3
DESCRIPTION: Lithium-3 internal inductance.

NAME: n_e_min_P_LH
DESCRIPTION: n_e_min_P_LH scalar measurement

NAME: n_i_line_avg
DESCRIPTION: Line-averaged ion density.

NAME: n_i_volume_avg
DESCRIPTION: Volume-averaged ion density.

NAME: rho_b
DESCRIPTION: rho_b scalar measurement.

NAME: rho_q_2_1_first
DESCRIPTION: First/second crossings of q = m/n surface.

NAME: rho_q_2_1_second
DESCRIPTION: First/second crossings of q = m/n surface.

NAME: rho_q_3_1_first
DESCRIPTION: First/second crossings of q = m/n surface.

NAME: rho_q_3_1_second
DESCRIPTION: First/second crossings of q = m/n surface.

NAME: rho_q_3_2_first
DESCRIPTION: First/second crossings of q = m/n surface.

NAME: rho_q_3_2_second
DESCRIPTION: First/second crossings of q = m/n surface.

NAME: v_loop_lcfs
DESCRIPTION: Loop voltage measured at the last closed flux surface.
